attributes.action: Change the Colwyn Bay 50mph stretch of the A55 to 70mph
attributes.background: The area of the A55 by Colwyn Bay is reduced to 50mph. The speed drop often causes high volume traffic to slam on their brakes, causing high congestion and accidents. The speed should remain the same in order ease these problems

rejection.details:
Local speed restrictions below national speed limits are the responsibility of the local authority.

You can find out which local authority is responsible using a postcode and this website: 

https://www.gov.uk/request-speed-limit-change   

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
